languages.text: Едва ваши люди возвращаются на флагман, как приходит астропатический ответ администратумского ордината: вину за незаконную добычу возлагают на губернатора одного из ближайших миров Чорда. Преступник понесет суровую кару, а компенсация будет немедленно направлена в казну Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: [draft] Пока ваши люди готовятся к отбытию на планету, приходит астропатический ответ администратумского ордината: сие недоразумение возникло по причине вопиющей некомпетентности губернатора прилегающих систем Чорды. Виновные будут наказаны по высшей мере, компенсация — немедленно направлена в казну Вольного Торговца. Вестовой хора не успевает вас покинуть, как вокс-канал оживает статическим шумом: связной шаттла докладывает о высадке на поверхность Атля.

languages.text: As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.
languages.original_text: Едва ваши люди возвращаются на флагман, как приходит астропатический ответ администратумского ордината: вину за незаконную добычу возлагают на губернатора одного из ближайших миров Чорда. Преступник понесет суровую кару, а компенсация будет немедленно направлена в казну Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

languages.text: Als deine Leute zum Flaggschiff zurückkehren, erhältst du eine astropathische Antwort vom Ordinat des Administratums: Der Gouverneur einer der nächstliegenden Chorda-Welten war an dem illegalen Bergbau beteiligt. Der Übeltäter wird schwer bestraft und die Kompensierung sofort an die Schatzkammer {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} geschickt.
languages.original_text: As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

traits.locale_text: Als deine Leute zum Flaggschiff zurückkehren, erhältst du eine astropathische Antwort vom Ordinat des Administratums: Der Gouverneur einer der nächstliegenden Chorda-Welten war an dem illegalen Bergbau beteiligt. Der Übeltäter wird schwer bestraft und die Kompensierung sofort an die Schatzkammer {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} geschickt.

languages.text: Alors que vos effectifs regagnent le vaisseau amiral, vous recevez un message astropathique de la part de l'Administratum : le gouverneur d'un monde de Chorda est impliqué dans une affaire de minage illégale. Le coupable sera sévèrement châtié et une compensation sera immédiatement transférée dans le trésor {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

traits.locale_text: Alors que vos effectifs regagnent le vaisseau amiral, vous recevez un message astropathique de la part de l'Administratum : le gouverneur d'un monde de Chorda est impliqué dans une affaire de minage illégale. Le coupable sera sévèrement châtié et une compensation sera immédiatement transférée dans le trésor {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: 当你的人回到旗舰之后，你收到了来自内政部行政文员的星语通讯——库尔达麾下某个邻近行星的总督被指控涉嫌非法采矿。肇事者将受到严厉惩罚，所有赔偿都会立刻送到行商浪人的国库。
languages.original_text: As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

traits.locale_text: 当你的人回到旗舰之后，你收到了来自内政部行政文员的星语通讯——库尔达麾下某个邻近行星的总督被指控涉嫌非法采矿。肇事者将受到严厉惩罚，所有赔偿都会立刻送到行商浪人的国库。

languages.text: En cuanto tu gente vuelve a la nave insignia, recibes una respuesta astropática del ordenanza del Astrópata: el gobernador de uno de los mundos cercanos de la dinastía Chorda estaba implicado en la explotación ilícita. Recibirá un severo castigo y se compensará a la tesorería de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de inmediato.
languages.original_text: As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto tu gente vuelve a la nave insignia, recibes una respuesta astropática del ordenanza del Astrópata: el gobernador de uno de los mundos cercanos de la dinastía Chorda estaba implicado en la explotación ilícita. Recibirá un severo castigo y se compensará a la tesorería de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de inmediato.

languages.text: あなたの部下が旗艦に戻るとすぐに、帝国行政局のオーディネイトから感応通信による返答が届いた。最寄りの惑星チョーダの一つの総督が違法採掘に関与していたことが判明した。犯人は厳罰に処罰され、賠償金は直ちにローグトレーダーの金庫に送られるとのことだった。
languages.original_text: As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

traits.locale_text: あなたの部下が旗艦に戻るとすぐに、帝国行政局のオーディネイトから感応通信による返答が届いた。最寄りの惑星チョーダの一つの総督が違法採掘に関与していたことが判明した。犯人は厳罰に処罰され、賠償金は直ちにローグトレーダーの金庫に送られるとのことだった。

languages.text: Mürettebat sancak gemisine döner dönmez Administratum ordinatından Astropatik yanıt geliyor: Yakın Chorda dünyalarından birinin valisi, yasa dışı madenciliğe karışmış. Suçlu, ağır biçimde cezalandırılacak; tazminat da vakit kaybetmeden Hür Tacir'in hazinesine aktarılacak.
languages.original_text: As soon as your people return to the flagship, you receive an Astropathic response from the Administratum ordinate: the governor of one of the nearest Chorda worlds has been implicated in the illegal mining. The perpetrator will be severely punished, and compensation will be sent to the Rogue Trader's treasury immediately.

traits.locale_text: Mürettebat, sancak gemisine döner dönmez Administratum ordinatından Astropatik yanıt gelir: Yakın Chorda dünyalarından birinin valisi yasa dışı madenciliğe karışmıştır. Suçlu ağır biçimde cezalandırılacak, tazminat da vakit kaybetmeden Hür Tacir'in hazinesine aktarılacaktır.
